msg.msgText: A message consumer could not be created: ConnectionID={0} ClientID={1} Endpoint={2} UserID={3} Protocol={4} Error={5} RC={6}.

msgExplanation.p: The Message Gateway server could not create a message consumer. See the error code for more information about the cause of this problem.

msgUserResponse.p: Review the error and resolve the problem that is causing the request to be rejected.
